title: The Haunted Wasteland
description: Rachel Cormac has grown listless of her existence as a one of the undead. Her only objective is to seek peaceful solitude away from the living. But when she stumbles upon signs of a refuge in Carmel, New York offering shelter to survivors she must make a choice whether to attack or leave humanity alone. She must learn to fight off her endless hunger for warm flesh or emancipate herself as part of a dying world.Cover Kila-IbyaoAuthorâ€™s This is a novella
author: Keith Luethke
